properties.prefix:
Experiment


  • There are specific field-sets for recommended aspects of description. The “type” sub-field is used to fine tune the meaning, the “value” sub-field is used to indicate a key-word or phrase for that aspect, and the “note” sub-field is used for a longer text which amplifies the meaning or indicates a special consideration.

  • If there is no specific field-set for your purpose, use “keyword” for typed descriptive words or phrases and “note” for typed descriptive texts.

properties.description: The required name, label or formal title of the experiment being described. This is the primary way of naming this experiment in the system.
properties.title: Primary Title

properties.description: Use this if there are other names or titles associated with the experiment in the context of your research.
properties.title: Alternate Titles

properties.description: The type of alternate title such as Abbreviation.
properties.title: Alternate Title Type

properties.description: This is a general description or abstract about what you know about the experiment.
properties.title: Summary Description

properties.description: Keywords, subject terms, key phrases classification codes, etc., ideally drawn from a thesaurus, which classifies or describes the experiment and for which there are no more specific fields in the form.
properties.title: Keywords

properties.description: The type of keyword, such as Subject, Geographic or Temporal. Leaving type blank would imply general keywords.
properties.title: Keyword Type

properties.description: Formal strings of characters that are used to uniquely identify the experiment in various systems. This can also be used to create a formal identifier for the experiment for your project.
properties.title: Identifiers

properties.description: The name of the system or standard for which the identifier was created.
properties.title: Identifier Type

properties.description: A standard identifier for the entity, e.g. ISSN, opus no., etc., or a URI.
properties.title: Identifier

properties.description: A reference to another experiment from which this experiment was derived or to another project which created the experiment.
properties.title: Source

properties.description: The type of source, e.g. a dataset or another experiment.
properties.title: Source Type

properties.description: Brief text describing the source.
properties.title: Source

properties.description: Other entities that are related to the experiment, such as the name of a larger experiment which the experiment being described is or was a part.
properties.title: Relations

properties.description: General notes that provide descriptions for other aspects relevant to your understanding of the experiment, and for which there are no more specific fields in the form.
properties.title: Notes

properties.description: The type of note such as General Notes.
properties.title: Note Type

properties.description: This can be used to register specific dates associated with the experiment, such as the year it was designed or first run.
properties.title: Time Periods

properties.description: The type of date such as Create Date or Date Modified.
properties.title: Time Period Type

properties.description: A textual date such as a time period name, e.g. "the 20th Century" or "the Mesozoic era".
properties.title: Textual Date

properties.description: Dates associated with the experiment being described.
properties.title: Numeric Dates

properties.description: The type of date such as Begin Date or End Date.
properties.title: Date Type

properties.description: This can be used to describe places associated with the experiment.
properties.title: Place Information

properties.description: The type of place being described such as, the Collection place or the Storage location.
properties.title: Place Type

properties.description: Name of a geographic location pertaining to the entity being described e.g. Country, Province, Region, etc.
properties.title: Geographic Areas

properties.description: This is used to identify the time period during which the place was relevant to the experiment.
properties.title: Place Time Period

properties.description: A textual date such as a time period name, e.g. "the 20th Century" or "the Mesozoic era".
properties.title: Textual Date

properties.description: The type of numeric date such as Begin Date or End Date.
properties.title: Date Type

properties.description: Notes pertaining to the place date being described.
properties.title: Place Date Notes

properties.description: Notes pertaining to the place being described.
properties.title: Place Notes

properties.description: This is used to identify people or organizations that have a special relationship to the experiment. For example, the person who designed it, or an organization that specifically funded it.
properties.title: Related People and Organizations

properties.description: The role of a person related to the experiment, such as "designer”.
properties.title: Role

properties.description: The name of the person.
properties.title: Person Name

properties.description: The role of an organization related to the experiment, such as “funder” or “sponsor”.
properties.title: Role

properties.description: The name of the organization.
properties.title: Organization Name

properties.description: The taxonomic name of a species that is specific to the experiment (if applicable).
properties.title: Taxonomic Classification

properties.description: The full scientific name. When forming part of an Identification, this should be the name in lowest level taxonomic rank that can be determined.
properties.title: Species

properties.description: This is used to classify and/or describe the physical characteristics of an experiment, such as hardware used or a description of the layout of it.
properties.title: Physical Description

properties.description: The type of physical characteristic being described.
properties.title: Physical Description Type

properties.description: This is used to describe the setting or surroundings that are specific to the design of the experiment.
properties.title: Context

properties.description: The type of context being described.
properties.title: Context Type

properties.description: Brief text describing the context of the experiment.
properties.title: Context

properties.description: The type of format being described.
properties.title: Format Type

properties.description: Physical or digital manifestation. Format may include media-type.
properties.title: Format

properties.description: A description of a methodology that is implemented in the experiment.
properties.title: Methods

properties.description: The type of method being described.
properties.title: Method Type

properties.description: Brief text describing the method.
properties.title: Method Description

properties.description: A description of a technique that is used in the experiment.
properties.title: Technique

properties.description: A type of technique used in the experiment.
properties.title: Technique Type

properties.description: Brief text describing the technique.
properties.title: Technique

properties.description: Either a textual or formal numeric description of the dimensions of an experiment, such as area in time it takes to run or how much it costs to run.
properties.title: Measurements

properties.description: A textual description of a measurement such as “L 12 inches; H 6 inches”.
properties.title: Measurement Text

properties.description: A measurement intended to be a single dimension using a combination of the type, value and units attributes.
properties.title: Measurement Numeric

properties.description: The type of measurement such as height, depth, circumference or number of components.
properties.title: Measurement Type

properties.description: The numeric value of the measurement.
properties.title: Measurement Value

properties.description: The unit of measurement such as inches, feet, centimeters, or components.
properties.title: Measurement Unit

properties.description: Dates associated with a measurement.
properties.title: Measurement Dates

properties.description: The type of date associated with the measurement.
properties.title: Date Type

properties.description: A textual date such as a time period name, e.g. "the 20th Century" or "the Mesozoic era".
properties.title: Textual Date

properties.description: A numeric date associated with the entity being described.
properties.title: Numeric Date

properties.description: The type of numeric date such as Begin or End date.
properties.title: Date Type

properties.description: Explanatory text on the accuracy of the set of measurements.
properties.title: Measurement Accuracy
